physical_appearance: This is an orange cheongsam and it is sleeveless. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. There are red, light oranger, and purple coloured floral motifs appearing all over the cheongsam. They come in different shapes and sizes. The piping of the cheongsam runs from the collar to its left side, just below its left arm hole.
sgcool_label_text: This is a sleeveless orange cheongsam with pink, brown and green floral prints. This cheongsam was wore by Mrs Lee In Tong in her younger days.
subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns allover patterns
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Women's clothing Motifs
